title: The Dishonest Son and The ‘Ghost’ Doctor Mother - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Age Progression   Ancient China   Anti-social Protagonist   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Bodyguards   Broken Engagement   Child Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cohabitation   Cold Love Interests   Complex Family Relationships   Confident Protagonist   Cute Children   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Medical Knowledge   Royalty   Transmigration
author: Sen Sen   森森
description:
Yu Qingluo is a transmigrator previously known in the modern world for her marvelous medical skills and eccentric disposition. One day she transmigrates into the body of same name, a young girl who got pregnant after she was framed and abandoned cruelly by her own husband.

The story follows Yu Qingluo and her son in their way to find a person. However, she suddenly again meets that cruel man from 6 years ago and decides to prepare to take her revenge. Except, that her plans goes awry as her son once again decides to misbehave…>
